memberdef.name: BOARD_PA_GAIN
memberdef.initializer: (10) /* Power amplifier gain defined by board (dB) */

memberdef.name: AUDIO_CODEC_DEFAULT_CONFIG
memberdef.initializer: { \ .adc_input = AUDIO_HAL_ADC_INPUT_LINE1, \ .dac_output = AUDIO_HAL_DAC_OUTPUT_ALL, \ .codec_mode = AUDIO_HAL_CODEC_MODE_BOTH, \ .i2s_iface = { \ .mode = AUDIO_HAL_MODE_SLAVE, \ .fmt = AUDIO_HAL_I2S_NORMAL, \ .samples = AUDIO_HAL_48K_SAMPLES, \ .bits = AUDIO_HAL_BIT_LENGTH_16BITS, \ }, \ };
